price: ហើយវាជាការដាស់តឿនព្រមានដល់ពួក(យ៉ាហ៊ូទី ណាសរ៉នី និងមូស្ហរីគីន)ដែលបាននិយាយថាៈ អល់ឡោះមានបុត្រ។
arabic: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wayundhira alladhīna qālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
